instructions: Move the dinner plate to the bottom of the table cloth
Move the dinner fork to the left of the dinner plate with its prongs pointing to the top of the table
Move the salad fork to the left of the dinner fork with prongs in the same direction
Move the dinner knife to the right of the plate
Move the salad knife to the right of the dinner knife
Move the soup spoon to the right of the salad knife
Move the water glass to the right of the plate and in front of the dinner knife
Move the wine glass to the right of the water glass
Move the second wine glass to the right of the first wine glass
Move the coffee cup to the right of the soup spoon
Move the bread plate above the dinner fork
Put the butter knife on the bread plate with blade facing away from dinner plate
Move dessert fork in front of dinner plate with prongs facing water glass
Move dessert fork in front of dinner plate and in front of dessert spoon
